tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NN Today)) (, ,) (VP (VB look) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT an) (NN opportunity) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB change) (NP (NP (NN someone) (POS 's)) (NN life)) (PP (RB instead) (IN of) (S (VP (VBG pleasing) (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ own))))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [look/VB nsubj>Today/NN punct>,/, nmod:for>[opportunity/NN case>for/IN det>an/DT acl>[change/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[life/NN nmod:poss>[someone/NN case>'s/POS]] advcl>[pleasing/VBG mark>[instead/RB mwe>of/IN] dobj>[own/JJ nmod:poss>your/PRP$]]]] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP It)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (DT a) (ADJP (RB much) (RBR more) (JJ rewarding)) (NN experience))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [experience/NN nsubj>It/PRP cop>is/VBZ det>a/DT amod>[rewarding/JJ advmod>much/RB advmod>more/RBR] punct>!/.]
